data: `minecraft:behavior.follow_owner` allows an entity to follow a player marked as an owner.
`minecraft:behavior.follow_owner` requires the entity to be marked as an owner through taming.

data.Name: can_teleport
data.Description: Specify if the mob can teleport to the player if it is too far away

data.Name: ignore_vibration
data.Description: Specify if the mob will follow the owner if it has heard a vibration lately

data.Name: max_distance
data.Description: The maximum distance in blocks this mob can be from its owner to start following, only used when canTeleport is false

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

data.Name: start_distance
data.Description: The distance in blocks that the owner can be away from this mob before it starts following it

data.Name: stop_distance
data.Description: The distance in blocks this mob will stop from its owner while following it
